name: NU_COVID_19TestPanelsForSARS_CoV_2Antigen
title: NU_COVID_19 (Test Panels for SARS_CoV_2 Antigen)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panel names associated with detecting the presence of SARS_CoV_2 Antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: coronavirus 2 antigen panel),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
